entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this afternoon then 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late this afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late this morning. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 7 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Saturday 11 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High zero.
